Ningqiang County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi

sentences.english: The Ningqiang County quake relief headquarters advised residents not to live indoors.
sentences.chinese: 寧強縣地震救災指揮部提醒居民不要住在室內。
